title: 3. Underpinning Knowledge - Legislation and Professional Issues
cleaned_text: The public can confuse homeopathic with herbal products as homeopathic products are often derived from herbs and are called by their botanical name, e.g. Aloe, and also because a single manufacturer may produce both homeopathic and herbal products. Pharmacists can help the public understand the difference between homeopathy and herbal products using information in our guide
